ai-patthana16.83:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.83:0.3_0: overcoming the excessive conditions, they’re considered without decrease.
ai-patthana16.83:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to placing the mind and keeping it connected. That is not a condition for the sake of impingement.
ai-patthana16.83:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to placing the mind and keeping it connected. That is not a cause of an inclination.
ai-patthana16.83:2.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to placing the mind and keeping it connected. That is not a cause of an inclination.
ai-patthana16.83:2.1_2: because of not doing this, but without placing the mind and keeping it connected. They don’t give rise to placing the mind or keeping it connected. They don’t arise because of that.
ai-patthana16.83:2.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
